title: STK Los Cabos location at airport
statement: STK Los Cabos is located inside Los Cabos International Airport near Terminal 2 at B.C.S MX, Carr. Transpeninsular Km 43.5, 23420 San José del Cabo, B.C., Mexico

citations.quote: STK Los Cabos is located at B.C.S MX, Carr. Transpeninsular Km 43.5, 23420 San José del Cabo, B.C., Mexico , inside the Los Cabos International Airport complex near Terminal 2.
